DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect sedatives propofol midazolam stress response immune function critically ill patient alcohol use disorder undergoing mechanical ventilation .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Evaluating Stress Response Immune Function Mechanically Ventilated Patients With Alcohol Use Disorders Treated With Propofol Midazolam
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis alcohol use disorder Need invasive mechanical ventilation Need continuous intravenous infusion sedative ( ) Age < 18 year Pregnant woman Prisoners Receiving propofol prior randomization Patient experience active alcohol withdrawal Immunosuppression Shock Attending physician feel patient candidate receive either propofol midazolam Patient contraindication ( ) receive either propofol midazolam Inability enroll patient within 96 hour initiation mechanical ventilation Transfer another intensive care unit
